title: Waco Mammoth National Monument: Additional Mammoth Sites
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Additional Mammoth Sites            Mammoth Sites in the United States          Big Bone Lick State Park, Boone County KY http://parks.ky.gov/parks/historicsites/big-bone-lick/     Lubbock Lake National Historic Landmark, Lubbock TX https://www.depts.ttu.edu/museumttu/lll/visitus.html    Rancho La Brea, Los Angeles CA  http://www.tarpits.org/    The Mammoth Site, Hot Springs SD  http://mammothsite.com/    Blackwater Draw, Portalis NM https://www.enmu.edu/services/museums/blackwater-draw/    Tule Springs Fossil Beds National Monument, Las Vegas NV http://www.nps.gov/tusk/index.htm   Channel Islands National Park, Ventura CA  http://www.nps.gov/chis/learn/historyculture/pygmymammoth.htm
